titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Inouye. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/16/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs from March 1, 1987, through February 29, 1988, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize department or agency personnel on a reimbursable basis; (4) procure consultant services; and (5) provide for training its professional staff.
